entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Flurries beginning before morning. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches becoming fog this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. A few rain showers beginning in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
